sentences.sContent: Also known as the auricle, it works like a funnel, directing sounds into the ear canal.
sentences.sContent_eng: Also known as the auricle, it works like a funnel, directing sounds into the ear canal.
sentences.sCn: 耳廓也被称为外耳，能起到漏斗一样功用，将声音导入耳道。

synos.tran: 耳廓；外耳；[解剖][脊椎]心耳

trans.tranOther: a small sac in the atrium of the heart
